name: Elegant Restaurant
address: 46 Phạm Ngũ Lão  Phú Hội Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Launched in September 2014, and quickly become a famous restaurant in Hue, owners are group of Tour Leaders and restaurant manager who have worked in Tourism industry for almost over 10 years. Restaurant located right at a tourist area of Hue City, or other way is called Downtown of Hue, Elegant Restaurant offers a warm welcome while dining and drinking in the relaxing atmosphere. It has spacious place with several separate parts; The front airy yard, enjoying quiet and relaxing atmosphere, the cozy comfortable indoor and mezzanine equipped with high end music and combined together to provide our visitors a full service, including Vietnamese food, BBQ food, Fusion food, Italian food, and moreover find great coffee, well popular selection of wine, Ice cream are available to gratify our dear guests. We wish to bring you a wonderful experiences when you are in this beautiful historical City.
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Tasty and delicious food with good service. We had a variety of Vietnamese dishes in this restaurant, the staff were all very helpful and charming, especially Duyen ( see photo ) & the manager Mimi who has good command of English After some weeks in Vietnam we found we were craving some more vibrant flavours, as some dishes in other restaurants were becoming bland .. in this restaurant the flavours were excellent.. the chicken skewers were cooked to perfection and the slow roasted pork ribs in bbq sauce were tender & very tasty!! 🤤 the grilled prawns in tamarind sauce were absolutely delicious so tasty, our favourite!! The alcoholic drink is more expensive than some restaurants. A vodka and Diet Coke (40,000) was 135,000 ( £4.10) and a bottle of dalak wine was double at 399,000 .. whereas last night just around the corner we paid 200,000 a bottle !! A big increase! However the food was good value on the whole we had 4 dishes £18 ( 620,000) .. 2 vodkas one Diet Coke & one huda beer total bill was 885,000 (£26.90)

The food here is very nice. The atmosphere is relaxing. We sat for a long time watching local children playing a game of football in the street, none were wearing shoes. It was great entertainment. After we had eaten, two big tour groups arrived and filled the restaurant so I would advise you to go earlier if in doubt. Our waitress was called Thor and she was very attentive and professional. My mixed vegetables with cashews came with rice and was very nice, perhaps too many onions for my taste but plenty of other vegetables too. The garnishes are beautiful. On Friday and Saturday nights I believe that traffic is stopped from using the street so that’s the best time to go.

We are on a month long trip in Vietnam and Cambodia and decided to stop in here for dinner while in Hue. We were so warmly received by the staff ( especially MiMi), who not only helped us choose our drinks and meals, but schooled us in the use of chopsticks. My husband had chicken mushroom soup, and he and I both had chicken brochettes with rice, which came with a varied selection of fresh and grilled vegetables. The menu is extensive ( both Western and Vietnamese choices) and one meal was more than I could finish. I highly recommend this restaurant in Hue, with its homey feel and wonderful staff and food.

name: Family Home Cafe & Restaurant
address: 11/34 Nguyen Tri Phuong, Hue 8454 Vietnam
description: Greeting from Family Home Restaurant! With the aim of serving our valued guests fresh & delicious dishes,we always buy food daily from the markets and only cook the food right after you order your dishes.( Meanwhile other restaurants may prepare the food in advance and they just rewarm it when you order).Besides, we also put the hygienic standard on the highest importance. Also, we would like to introduce to you several local specialities by guiding you the way of cooking if you prefer ( cooking show). We are pleased to welcome you !
cuisines: Seafood Restaurants for Breakfast in Hue
example_reviews: The small restaurant is located away from the hustle and bustle in a side street; we ate on the terrace on the first floor, which made it pleasantly quiet. We had papaya salad with shrimp and fish in the claypot - both excellent, especially the quality of the fish! The owner was super friendly and didn't charge us for the extra portion of rice we ordered. The portions weren't the biggest, but they were sufficient and the slightly higher price (around â‚¬10 for both dishes + drinks) was really justified for the quality and taste of the food. The restaurant is definitely worth a visit (or several).

We have been to this restaurant twice during our stay in Hue and it will certainly not be the last! The dishes are excellent and the menu allows you to taste all the typical dishes of Hue at low prices! Special mention for the spring rolls which are excellent, the best we have eaten since our arrival in Vietnam! We are always very well received by our host. She is smiling and gives good advice, she takes the time to explain to us how each dish is eaten, which is very appreciated. The upstairs is very intimate with few tables which allows you to eat in peace. I recommend, you can go there with your eyes closed.

Between 2 adults we shared an appetiser of Hue fried spring rolls and pork cooked on lemon grass skewers (to wrap in rice paper) and a main course of crispy noodles with beef. The whole meal was delicious just wish we could have squeezed in more food. Three dishes, one Huda beer and 2 mango smoothies totalled 340K VND. Had to go back a second time for the spring rolls, a chicken curry and Hue noodle with fried pork and vegtable. We highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Dmz Bar & Restaurant
address: 60 Le Loi st, Hue Vietnam
description: If you want to drink during your time in Hue, than the DMZ Bar is the place to stay. We are open from 7 am until 2:30 am for drinks and 7 am until midnight for food.
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Very good service, nice staff and good food. Love the service from My- she has super energy! Really enjoy the atmosphere in this place!

My favourite bar in Hue - I visited 3 times Morning coffee cappuccinos are great. Also some excellent Vietnamese dishes and some western style food too - I enjoyed all The hudda draught comes in a big chilled glass and goes down a treat. The best part about this bar are the staff; they’re courteous, efficient and cheerful offering a top service to their customers The decor is pretty cool too

Efficient prompt service in English with a smile. Tasty snacks & meals & your beer is replenished before you finish your first one! You can even book a superb DMZ tour while you down a cold draught beer at a price that won’t break the bank. I’ll be back again for more!

name: Pizz.á Restaurant - Italian Cuisine
address: 34 Chu Văn An 2nd Floors, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description:
Spacious, quiet, clean restaurant/pizzeria on the upper floor of a building on a street that's mostly pedestrian in the evening.
The waitresses and waiters are extremely nice, going above and beyond to make sure you have everything you need.
The food itself... *sigh. I ate here twice in three days. Pizza Margherita first, delicious dough, fresh and tasty ingredients. Then pasta the second time, the vegetable lover spaghetti: the mixed vegetable sauce brought me straight to summer back in Italy, all the flavours were there and just right.
Also appreciated the potato wedges or French fries, as the menu says, and the complimentary (thank you!) miso ice-cream was interesting with that spicy mix on top, and itself fresh and good and a nice texture.
Were I staying longer in Hue, I'd likely return a third time!
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Spacious, quiet, clean restaurant/pizzeria on the upper floor of a building on a street that's mostly pedestrian in the evening. The waitresses and waiters are extremely nice, going above and beyond to make sure you have everything you need. The food itself... *sigh. I ate here twice in three days. Pizza Margherita first, delicious dough, fresh and tasty ingredients. Then pasta the second time, the vegetable lover spaghetti: the mixed vegetable sauce brought me straight to summer back in Italy, all the flavours were there and just right. Also appreciated the potato wedges or French fries, as the menu says, and the complimentary (thank you!) miso ice-cream was interesting with that spicy mix on top, and itself fresh and good and a nice texture. Were I staying longer in Hue, I'd likely return a third time!

Great service amazing pizza. Really nice surroundings and atmosphere. Really good value for money. Would definitely come back to this place again. Oh did I forget to mention the nice and friendly waiters. If there was one thing to comment on it would be the IGers. (People who take photos for instagram or any other) but overall amazing. As a family and individual it was brilliant. My 10 year old daughter thought it was the best pizza place she had ever been to.

As tourists in Hue we spent lovely time in this restaurant and we really enjoyed the pizza here! We really appreciate the relaxed atmosphere and the extremely kind and professional waiters. Si Huy followed us in each step of our dinner: he introduced very well the menu, enhancing the originality of the offer and he took care of us in every part of our pizza experience. We really appreciated the pizza, very tasty and rich in terms of ingredients! A really nice pizza experience in Hue, highly recommended!

name: Hương Ngự Restaurant
address: 12F, 33 Hai Ba Trung street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Huong Ngu Restaurant is one of the most renowned and upscale dining venues in Hue city. Located on the 12th floor of the Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel at 33 Hai Ba Trung St., the restaurant stands out with its unique Imperial Hue architecture and offers diners an exceptional culinary experience. IMPERIAL HUE ARCHITECTURE Huong Ngu Restaurant is designed in the traditional style of Hue's imperial architecture. With a spacious, luxurious, and naturally lit environment, the restaurant provides a comfortable and relaxing ambiance for enjoying meals. The Imperial Hue architecture is blended with modern elements, creating a unique and elegant space. From the detailed imperial paintings and traditional cultural performances to the authentic Huế dishes, Huong Ngu offers diners a wonderful cultural and culinary experience of Hue. SOPHISTICATION IN ASIAN-EUROPEAN CUISINE Huong Ngu Restaurant is famous for its rich and diverse menu, harmoniously combining Asian and European...
example_reviews: The beautifully presented dishes truly captured the essence of authentic Hue cuisine. The knowledgeable and attentive staff made us feel like royalty, guiding us through a menu that celebrated traditional recipes passed down through generations. It was the perfect setting for our special occasion, and we left with a newfound appreciation for Hue's culinary heritage.

The wide-ranging menu catered to all tastes, with unique regional dishes and vegetarian options that didn't disappoint. Each plate was a work of art, showcasing the restaurant's dedication to excellence. It's no wonder they have such an excellent online reputation. We'll definitely be returning for another romantic meal.

The atmosphere here was elegant and stylish and perfect for dating. The food was really like a work of art! Each dish was so beautifully plated that it was too late to eat. But the taste was even more amazing. The unique flavours of Vietnamese cuisine were perfectly harmonious. Especially the balance of spices is exquisite, so the taste in the mouth is full.

name: Hạ - Cơm Nấu Lối Huế
address: 01 Nguyễn Sinh Cung Phường Vỹ Dạ, Quận Thuận Hoá, Hue 49000 Vietnam
description: Gorgeous spot a few steps away from the main city. Really modern restaurant situated on a small island over a bridge. Stunning space, delicious food, great service. Phuong Trinh was very helpful recommending some great dishes.
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Gorgeous spot a few steps away from the main city. Really modern restaurant situated on a small island over a bridge. Stunning space, delicious food, great service. Phuong Trinh was very helpful recommending some great dishes.

This restaurant opened only 3 months ago and is very good positioned near the river. Classy experience and very good kitchen. The service lacks experience but this will get better with time. Overall a very good experience.

name: La Boulangerie Francaise
address: 46 Nguyen Tri Phuong Street, Hue Vietnam
description:
Crispy warm pain de chocolate and coffee on the planted balcony was just what I needed.  ðŸ˜‹

Tiny front was a little tricky to find but lots of cakes and crusty baguettes available with good coffee and friendly service.  Go up the tiny staircase and sit on the upstairs verandah
cuisines: Late Night Asian Restaurants in Hue
Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Crispy warm pain de chocolate and coffee on the planted balcony was just what I needed. ðŸ˜‹ Tiny front was a little tricky to find but lots of cakes and crusty baguettes available with good coffee and friendly service. Go up the tiny staircase and sit on the upstairs verandah

Visited on an exceptionally wet day for tea and cakes. The selection wasnâ€™t extensive by the time we arrived but we ordered a carrot cake and a banana cake with hot drinks. We were directed to sit upstairs rather than at the counter and found that the stairs were steep and narrow. A lady coming down missed the last step and stumbled heavily into the stools. The cakes were just okay and not particularly large for the price but the ethical nature of the enterprise makes this acceptable.

I could have missed this cafe, which occupied a narrow shop space, if not for the cafe sign. I read the reviews and thought I would check it out, since I was in the vicinity. The slice of banana sponge cake paired with a cup of cafe au lait was a welcome teatime snack in the afternoon. The cake was not too sweet, despite having slices of caramelised banana on the top. I found myself a table on the 2nd floor, with its colorful decor. For a quiet afternoon, do give this cafe a visit.

name: Shino Sushi 2 - Japanese Restaurant - Hue
address: 22 Nguyen Thai Hoc Phu Hoi, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Best sushi ever in Hue, Viet Nam. Fresh and tasty. Stuff is very friendly. There is a nice amount to choose from, also deserts and drinks From Tripadvisor Tourist
cuisines: American Restaurants for Large Groups in Hue
example_reviews: This is a small sushi place with a huge menu. The sushi & sashimi are so fresh, and the values are great. We had a huge Sushi “boat”” for $20 & then ordered yellowtail & tuna. The yellowtail was so fresh, I could cut it with chopsticks, and it melted in my mouth. Our waitress, Thanh, was constantly keeping an eye on us, & her outgoing friendliness made us feel like we were at home. Cảm ơn, Thanh!

Japanese spectacular, I'd say the best I've ever eaten. Kim is lovely. They served us in an amabilisima way and even invited us to an extra dish that was delicious. The place is very central, we located it on trip Advisor and found it very easy. Quite a hit! Thank you Kim!!!

We love sushi and in our 3 week trip in Vietnam wanted to have the experience. We found this hidden gem in Hue and the experience was great. We tried two tempuras: sweet potato and shrimp and then a boat with 40 pieces of sushi rolls. It was unbelievably served and we think it will be difficult to find other place in the world with such quality and value for money (CAD $35...). We have traveled a lot, and we never tried something so well prepared and presented. When you are in Hue, please, go there and indulge in.

name: Ta Vet
address: 11 Vo Thi Sau Phu Hoi, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description:
Very good experience in a trendy place frequented by Vietnamese that almost reaches a street.

Food your way, extra spicy dishes are reported. They accept card with 2% commission, less than the rest.

It allows to try dishes like duck, frog or similar than the rest, more oriented to tourists do not offer.

It is more a lively bar than a restaurant, but allows you to live Vietnam and its customs as they are!
cuisines: Late Night Asian Restaurants in Hue
example_reviews: Very good experience in a trendy place frequented by Vietnamese that almost reaches a street. Food your way, extra spicy dishes are reported. They accept card with 2% commission, less than the rest. It allows to try dishes like duck, frog or similar than the rest, more oriented to tourists do not offer. It is more a lively bar than a restaurant, but allows you to live Vietnam and its customs as they are!

This is a very busy and friendly bar. Fantastic value for money and everybody was very helpful. The Huda lager is very good value and it’s amazing to see the locals order by the case. It was somebodies birthday and they had all the bar singing. Amazing atmosphere - and the food was also good!

If you're in Hue Ta Vet is not to be missed. Very busy, very popular, very friendly, great choice of beers. We're going to Vietnam for the 4th time in March 2025 and we rate this place as No.1 for food and drinks. Never miss it when we're in Hue.

name: Le Parfum
address: 5 Le Loi Street La Residence Hotel, Hue Vietnam
description: Food is a passion at La Residence. At Le Parfum talented Chefs experiment with creative Asian, Vietnamese and European flavours. At the heart of every dish are the very best of Vietnam’s fresh and vibrant produce combined with top quality imported specialty ingredients.
cuisines: Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: The food that we ordered as a party of 6 was cooked to perfection, with some lovely touches. The staff here are exceptional, well trained with an eye for detail. They were also very helpful and knowledgeable about the dishes, which made the choice so much easier. Being low season, the restaurant was quiet, but we made our own entertainment, so as a couple it might lack atmosphere at this time of year. Saying that, the staff make up for it.

We went to Le Parfum for the Degustation Experience which had been highly recommended to us . With good reason. It was really beautiful . Seven delicious , perfectly balanced courses beautifully presented. The service was impeccable . Wine list was quite limited but adequate-only two Aussie and two NZ wines on offer. We decided on a French Chardonnay and a Syrah which complemented the food perfectly. The wine however was very expensive. This seems to be a common theme in Vietnam with very little Aussie wine on offer and we have had numerous discussions about how to remedy this. All in all a really top quality offering.

Large dining room with terrace looking out at the river. we had the duck and sweet and sour prawns. very pleasant and nice to not have a change from noodles or rice pancakes. couldhave done with another prawn. apple tart with cherry sorbet and a caramelised banana with ice cream finished the meal nicely. not outstanding but very pleasant.

name: Vietnammese Restaurant & Fastfood22
address: 22 Trần Huy Liệu, Hue 49000 Vietnam
description: Vietnamese restaurant Local specialties Hue specialty’s Take away restaurant Vegetarians Fresh fruits juice&drink Coffe and cold beer Bánh mỳ việt nam Bún bò Huế Phở bò Seafoods There are 2 air-conditioned rooms with views of Hue Citadel. Free toilet Free luggage storage when visiting Hue imperial city. Welcome you!
cuisines: Italian Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: I recently visited a charming restaurant in Hue City, Vietnam, with a beautiful view of the Imperial City. The ambiance was serene, offering a relaxing atmosphere to enjoy a meal while overlooking the historic site. Food: The menu had a variety of classic Vietnamese dishes. I tried the Bun Bo Hue, which was rich and flavorful, offering a perfect balance of spices. The Stir-Fried Noodles with Chicken were cooked to perfection, with tender chicken and fresh vegetables. The Fried Rice with Shrimps was light yet satisfying, and the Chicken Spring Rolls were crispy, with a delightful dipping sauce that tied everything together. Each dish was authentic and delicious, showcasing the best of Vietnamese cuisine. Staff: The staff were extremely nice and friendly, providing excellent service throughout the meal. They were attentive without being intrusive and made us feel very welcome. Should give some tips from my perspective as they made me feel really welcome to their country. They also serve us with some banana at the end of the meal. Price: Surprisingly, the prices were pretty cheap, considering the quality of the food and the stunning view of the Imperial City. It was excellent value for money, making it a great spot for both locals and tourists. Overall: This restaurant in Hue City is a gem, offering delicious food, excellent service, and a memorable view of the Imperial City—all at an affordable price. Highly recommended!

FastFood 22 Huế is one of the ideal spots for those who love quick and convenient dining. Here are some highlights about this restaurant: Ambiance - Design: The restaurant features a modern, spacious, and clean layout. The furniture is arranged thoughtfully, creating a comfortable atmosphere for diners. - Music: Soft music plays in the background, adding to a pleasant dining experience. Menu - Variety: The menu is diverse, offering many delicious local dishes, including fries and other snacks. Notably, the food is prepared fresh and served generously. - Quality: Fresh ingredients are used, and the dishes are carefully prepared. The flavors are rich and well-balanced. Service - Efficiency: The staff is quick and friendly, and the owner is charming and enthusiastic. The wait time for food is minimal, making it perfect for busy individuals. - Cleanliness: The restaurant maintains high hygiene standards, from the dining area to the kitchen. Pricing - Affordability: The prices are quite reasonable compared to the quality of the food. FastFood 22 Huế is a fantastic choice for those who enjoy quick and convenient meals. With its comfortable ambiance, diverse menu, and attentive service, it promises a delightful dining experience. It’s definitely worth a visit if you’re in Huế!

We were in search of a quick Banh Mi lunch to go and found this on Google. We ordered the Vietnamese pork and grilled pork sandwiches, which were slightly more expensive than the typical Banh Mi but more substantive with more meat which they seemed to cook to order and was more saucy and flavorful. While we waited, they gave us wet wipes which they cooled with ice, as well as 2 bottles of water (we must've looked overheated after spending the morning in the Imperial city!). They even moved our scooter out of the sun so it wouldn't be hot.

name: Y Thao Garden
address: 03 Thach Han, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: To begin with this doesn’t looks like a restaurant. Initially I thought our driver stopped at another attraction. Staffs were great the only problem is the delay after ordering the food. It took more than 30 mins for us to get the food. Price is on the expensive side but the quality is good
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: To begin with this doesn’t looks like a restaurant. Initially I thought our driver stopped at another attraction. Staffs were great the only problem is the delay after ordering the food. It took more than 30 mins for us to get the food. Price is on the expensive side but the quality is good

I requested my driver to bring us somewhere local for lunch. He recommended us this place. At first glance, I thought it was high-end and expensive, I was thinking street food place and this was where he brought us to. This was a nice restaurant hidden in a garden, many seating areas. It was cozy and very vietnamese in terms of decoration. We were tired after visiting the Imperial City and weren't having much patience looking through the menu. We opted for the Vietnamese sets on the menu, we got two different lunch sets, the two most expensive ones, but I assure you, they are still quite cheap. We didn't regret it. We finished every dish, it was tasty and flavourful. The portions were great, we got to taste so many Vietnamese dishes, we lost count. The selection of drinks were great too. Overall, it is worth the money to dine here. It is certainly not the cheaper selection, but if you want to try many Vietnamese dishes in one seating, this is the go to place, I highly recommend it. We went there after lunch hours, only 1 to 2 tables of customers, very chill place. I don't know whether tour buses of tourists will dine there during lunch hours, if that's the case, this place will be full and service might not be as good. We were there after 2pm, yet service still was slightly on the slow side, I don't know whether it's considered fine- dining, the serving time between dishes is not short! If you want to have an AC place, drink some wine and dine Vietnamese dishes, do give this place a try.

Creative presentation of dishes . We ordered 2 set menu for the 3 of us as the portions were quite big. We especially liked the crispy duck , pancake and grilled lemongrass fish. Restaurant is set amidst a lush beautiful garden . However it was rather dark when we arrived for dinner and couldn’t see much of it The restaurant was quite packed and reservation would be advisable

name: Ganesh Indian Restaurant
address: 34 Nguyen Tri Phuong Street, Hue Vietnam
description: Walked past and asked a young lady eating her view, on her recommendation we tried the restaurant. The young lady who served us was very attentive, the food was excellent, really very tasty. Efficiency service. I would recommend a visit and can’t understand some of the reviews on here.
cuisines: American Restaurants for Breakfast in Hue
example_reviews: Walked past and asked a young lady eating her view, on her recommendation we tried the restaurant. The young lady who served us was very attentive, the food was excellent, really very tasty. Efficiency service. I would recommend a visit and can’t understand some of the reviews on here.

We had good biryani here.We asked the hotel manager to make it spicy and he literally made it spicy. Good taste and enjoyed the spicy food.Was worried if we would experience bad after effects after reading all the reviews.But we did not face any issues.
Healthy atmosphere, centrally located and friendly staff! Quantity of food is less as compared to other Indian restaurants in Vietnam, taste was good though it could be better!

name: Tha Om Garden House
address: Hue Vietnam
description:
We visited this beautiful and unique home, where we were retailed with stories of its family history. 

The owner of the house explained that tourist diners help to pay for the upkeep of the house, and we were glad to be able to contribute in a small way to keeping its history alive. 

Then we were served dinner, cooked by the lady of the house and her staff, and ate it by candlelight in the garden surrounded by the sound of crickets.

We were the only family there on that evening and it felt truly private and special.

Definitely recommend the experience. Something a little different and off the beaten track!
cuisines: French Restaurants for Large Groups in Hue
Italian Restaurants with Buffet in Hue
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: We visited this beautiful and unique home, where we were retailed with stories of its family history. The owner of the house explained that tourist diners help to pay for the upkeep of the house, and we were glad to be able to contribute in a small way to keeping its history alive. Then we were served dinner, cooked by the lady of the house and her staff, and ate it by candlelight in the garden surrounded by the sound of crickets. We were the only family there on that evening and it felt truly private and special. Definitely recommend the experience. Something a little different and off the beaten track!

We visited with Scenic and had a wonderful night. The host was entertaining and proudly displayed and explained his house. The meal was served by beautiful attentive girls in traditional dress. We were also entertained by a group of musicians.
Absolutely delicious meal in a beautiful traditional home with a history lesson and lovely service. Very beautiful experience that was greatly enjoyed by all!

name: Shiva Shakti Indian Restaurant
address: 27 Vo Thi Sau St, Hue Vietnam
description:
Extraordinary cooking for the dishes we chose!! Worth a Michelin star: fragrant biriani and aubergine dish, amazing raita,fresh Naan bread and the Thali had to be shared!
I travel a lot and this exceptional Indian restaurant in Hue is highly recommended,it beats tasteless noodles and pretentious
 other European restaurant cuisine.
The chef obviously uses the local fresh vegetables and herbs, Bravo 👏👏
My husband went into the kitchen to congratulate the chefs!
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Extraordinary cooking for the dishes we chose!! Worth a Michelin star: fragrant biriani and aubergine dish, amazing raita,fresh Naan bread and the Thali had to be shared! I travel a lot and this exceptional Indian restaurant in Hue is highly recommended,it beats tasteless noodles and pretentious other European restaurant cuisine. The chef obviously uses the local fresh vegetables and herbs, Bravo 👏👏 My husband went into the kitchen to congratulate the chefs!

The food in this restaurant is succulent, rich, freshly cooked and delicious. We came two nights on the trot. The chilli chicken starter is awesome, the chicken is cooked to perfection and the capsicums and onions have just the right crunch. I would recommend this restaurant to all those curry lovers who enjoy authentic food. Rajesh the host is very friendly and helpful.

The restaurants was a bit empty, but as Indian Food lovers we decided to eat here anyway. The food was very good and the youngest waiter who served us was very nice and helpful. He served with a smile and showed some interested, which we really appreciated. Thanks for the great service!

name: Le Soleil De Huế
address: 104/47 Kim Long, Hue Vietnam
description: Discover our glasshouse restaurant, adorned with exquisite French colonial and Art Deco-inspired furniture, resembling the elegance and romance of the French Indochina era. ‍ Indulge in the flavors of France as our skilled chef creates gastronomic masterpieces using the finest ingredients. Each dish is a harmonious blend of traditional French techniques and local influences, resulting in a culinary symphony that delights the senses. From classic French dishes to innovative creations, our menu caters to the most discerning palates, offering an unforgettable dining experience. ‍
example_reviews: We had a fabulous experience at this restaurant! The setting is very pleasant and tastefully decorated. Our dinner was delicious. We ordered a duck dish and a fish dish and both were well-cooked and balanced. The staff was excellent and very accommodating, especially Thuý! We will be recommending this restaurant to family and friends!

I recently dined at Le Soleil De Hue, and it was fantastic! The restaurant’s cozy and stylish atmosphere really added to the experience. The menu offered a wonderful selection of French dishes, each one crafted with fresh, local ingredients that added a unique touch. The flavors were vibrant and delicious, making each bite a pleasure. The staff were friendly and made sure everything was perfect. If you're in Hue and want to try some amazing French food with a local twist, Le Soleil De Hue is definitely worth a visit!
Authentic French restaurant I really missed French gastronomy. I really recommend this place as the staff and the service were excellent

name: Little Italy Restaurant
address: 10 Nguyễn Thái Học, Hue 53000 Vietnam
description: Located in famous tourist area, at 10 Nguyen Thai Hoc street , it is easy to find and experience Little Italy restaurant with bamboo architecture. Besides, the extensive authentic Italian, Western and traditional Vietnamese menu along with a great selection of wines, cocktails, beers, and other beverages both local and foreign might satify the diverse needs of customers. Food is prepared fresh everyday from our highly trained professional chefs. Little Italy is mentioned in guide books, one being Lonely Planet which is widely used by travelers
example_reviews: Good pizza and lovely service. Thank you to Ha’! Stopped for a lunch break on a hot afternoon. Restaurant was a perfect stop in ancient town area after touring the Hue Imperial City.

Little Italy is amazing! The pasta and pizza are very tasty, upon entering very attentively a small drink with a sandwich on the house. The decoration is beautiful and the host mr.Viet is very attentive. Who made sure we could order dessert that wasn't even on the menu.

The food tastes like home which is great when you want a change from all the delicious Vietnamese food you will indulge in. We were here with friends, visited three nights in a row and upon arrival each night we were given a complimentary vodka caramel drink and a complimentary piece of garlic bread each. The food is great, my husband thought the Pizza Supreme was the best he has had in a while, he had steak another night and thought it was cooked to perfection, I had Spaghetti Bolognese and thought it tasty. Chocolate Mousse for dessert was lovely. The food and drink prices here are really reasonable and our Server, Ha was lovely, friendly and attentive.

name: HotTuna Restaurant
address: 37 Vo Thi Sau, Hue 49118 Vietnam
description: HOT TUNA Restaurant & Bar Hue Specialities + Vietnamese Cuisine & Western + Draft & Craft Beer
example_reviews: Nice cozy location at crossroads right in the center. Delicious fresh tuna salad as before, after which very tender and very well prepared meat dish of 1 kilo. Fries and grilled vegetables included. The drinks aren't weak despite the ice cubes. Really recommended to eat. The manager pays close attention to make sure you don't lack anything. Price quality is very good.

This restaurant was close to the hotel where I was staying and I dropped in when I was a little hungry. The staff were all in black polo shirts and quick and efficient. One particularly unique male staff member was attentive and attentive. We refreshed ourselves by munching on some duck and drinking draft beer while watching the people passing by on the intersection. The duck was tender and delicious. We went there two days out of our three-day, two-night stay in Hue. It's a restaurant I'd like to visit again next time I'm in Hue.

Really good and cheap food. We ended up coming here for all the meals - simply because it was really good. Super cute staff. In the evening you can get up on the terrace and sit - and enjoy the whole street from above. Forret, main dish, drinks for 4 people, for just under 175 kr.

name: Chez Maïs
address: 67/2 Võ Thị Sáu, Hue Vietnam
description:
A friendly restaurant in a picturesque little alley in the center, "Chez Maïs" allows you to enjoy, at low prices, not only Vietnamese food but also typical dishes from Hue and its region. Furthermore, thanks to the location of the restaurant, it was away from noisy traffic that we were able to enjoy an excellent meal with my wife. The family atmosphere is welcoming and the service is quality. In addition, the staff speaks several languages including English and French, which greatly facilitates communication.

It’s an address that I highly recommend, a must!
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: A friendly restaurant in a picturesque little alley in the center, "Chez Maïs" allows you to enjoy, at low prices, not only Vietnamese food but also typical dishes from Hue and its region. Furthermore, thanks to the location of the restaurant, it was away from noisy traffic that we were able to enjoy an excellent meal with my wife. The family atmosphere is welcoming and the service is quality. In addition, the staff speaks several languages including English and French, which greatly facilitates communication. It’s an address that I highly recommend, a must!

The food here was really good, and the owner was very kind in discussing the menu. The fig salad was amazing, the other food was good. Prices were a bit more expensive than some of the very cheap eats we've been finding, but definitely still a very, very affordable meal - about 100K for many menu items. This is a small family restaurant. The seating area is a nice, shaded outdoor space. This place is definitely worth a visit for the fig salad alone! They also provided a really nice rice cracker as an appetizer and a yummy plate of fruit as a standard part of the meal.

French friends and others if you pass through Hué do not hesitate to go eat in this friendly little restaurant which will offer you family cuisine prepared with love by a super dynamic and involved team. Moreover Ha with his bright smile will be keen to make you discover your country. Not to be missed.

name: Lạc Thiện Restaurant
address: 6 Dinh Tien Hoang Street, Hue Vietnam
description: What a find, the staff were so friendly and helpful, explaining how to prepare the dishes we had ordered and suggesting others (cheaper but better!) than the one we originally chose. Definitely have the Banh Khaoi and Bang Cuon both delicious
example_reviews: What a find, the staff were so friendly and helpful, explaining how to prepare the dishes we had ordered and suggesting others (cheaper but better!) than the one we originally chose. Definitely have the Banh Khaoi and Bang Cuon both delicious

Restaurant with a power house of a woman running front of house (and cooking when required). She’s welcoming and lovely - we had a variety of delicious things such as ban kheoi (crispy omelette pancake shrimp / pork) banh cuonh, crispy noodles and more. All washed dow with local beer huda- she opens the. With a karate chop and gives you the opener and hopefully you’ll load up a picture of you and her bottle opener somewhere. Great fun. Great food. Beer and 4 x different things were 175k. If you find the plates small - order more - they’re only like A dollar or 80pence each. Lovely. Come often if you can!!!

Located near gate into imperial Palace we had lunch here before meeting our tour guide. All the staff are part of one family and they create a great vibe in their place - even showing us old photos of the restaurant. Must try the fresh made crispy pancake- WOW so good I wanted more. Local beer at 15k - cheapest we found in Hue. Spring rolls,fresh shrimp rolls ,stir fry vegetables with crispy noodles and banana pancakes with chocolate sauce . Add 3 big ,cold beers and all for 280k. Party trick to open the beers a surprise. Amazing place 👏

name: Zenith SkyBar
address: 50A Hung Vuong Street, Phu Nhuan Ward Level 34, Hue Vietnam
description: Elevate your spirits to the highest level at Zenith rooftop sky bar, where Hue's beauty unfolds before eyes. Let your soul immediately content with classic cocktails, refined wine and refreshing beverages while dancing the night away to the vibrant beats of our lively DJ from floor 34th at Meliá Vinpearl Hue.
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: This place is great for having dinner with your family or going on a date. The food is well served at a reasonable price, and they offer a spectacular view of the city from above. Our waitress, Nga, was extremely friendly and professional. She gave us some really good recommendations. I will come back here when I have a chance!

Beautiful bar and views of Hue. It's a very comfortable place that allows you to have a great time and enjoy a beautiful view of Hue from any vantage point. HUY was very attentive to us, very friendly and warm, always with a big smile, and very good service from everyone at the bar. We thoroughly enjoyed dinner here! - - - Very nice bar, beautiful views of Hue, is a very comfortable place that allows you to have a great time and have from any point a nice view of Hue. HUY was very attentive to us, very friendly and warm, always with a big smile, very good service from everyone at the Bar. We really enjoyed dining here!

Turned up here after dinner on Christmas night. Hue had been wet and misty so when the skies were clear we took our chance! I think if you are in a couple or a group of 4 this is probably a great bar. We were a group of 12 and because of the narrow nature of the bar it was hard for them to seat us, despite it not being that busy. Cocktails took a while to come, again they clearly don't normally do large groups. However they were well executed Cocktails. I had a daiquiri, the other half a long island iced tea. The staff are polite - so polite they waited until 11.10pm to say they had closed at 11pm! We only manged one drink but there was a good view of the city. Best seats are at either end of the bar. Worth a look if the skies are clear. Worth noting that the bar is enclosed.

name: An Nhiên Garden Restaurant
address: Kiet 11, Provincial Road 10A, Hue Vietnam
description: An Nhien Garden Restaurant stands as a beacon of sustainability, being the first restaurant in Hue city awarded the "Sustainable Tourist Destination" title. Located just 3km from the iconic Truong Tien bridge, it offers a unique dining experience within a historic garden that has been in the hands of one of Hue's first settlers for nearly 500 years and 22 generations. The restaurant's strong commitment to high-quality services, coupled with creativity and innovation, transforms traditional cuisine into an exquisite culinary journey. Experience the essence of Hue's heritage and sustainable dining at An Nhien Garden.
cuisines: Late Night Italian Restaurants in Hue
example_reviews: An evening at An Nhien Garden Vegetarian Cafe is an experience that no matter how long or how far you travel in Vietnam, will likely be the ONE place you just can't get out of your mind. We had the good fortune to meet Nhien who is the co owner with her sister An (thus the name An Nhien which in English sounds like "Onion"). And just like an onion, a meeting with Nhien is one where the complexity of this very special lady is revealed like the peeling of an onion with each layer revealing yet another side of this extraordinary woman. This property has been in the family for over 460 years!!! The idea of opening up this concept came about gradually and includes an entrance that begins at the grand gates which once entered is like coming into a magical world out of time and space. Whatever worries you may have experienced before entering, just melt away as you are instantly transported to a lush garden, expertly lit with subtle mood lights, gorgeous antiques and stunning artwork by an amazing buddhist Monk. All of this happens before you even get to the restaurant which is comfortably tucked into the back of the property like a lotus flower which seemingly opens just for you. Unlike most restaurants, the staff here are not just workers, they are emotionally connected to the purpose of this experience and their joy is as real as their commitment to creating an evening that surpasses your expectations. The food, the presentation, the attention to detail, the whole experience felt much like a Michelin restaurant.. that is if Michelin restaurants offered food that wasn't just a feast for the eyes and a gift to your waiting pallette but, also served with a love from the heart that can not be trained. There are sites to see in Vietnam and places to go but however you travel in Vietnam, if you want to experience something that will be a priceless gift to remember your whole life, come to An Nhien to immerse yourself in a timeless epicurean adventure that will leave you satiated both in body and soul!

I’ve never had such delicious vegetarian food. I didn’t realise Vietnamese people enjoy vegetarian meals. Often times I’ve only had the standard fare of spring rolls and Pho. The food in An Nhien Garden is such a delectable eye opener. Service was good and food even better. We had the hot pot and my goodness, the broth was out of the world. The lotus fried rice was very good. Food portions were just right and service was excellent; they speak French and English so we were never lost in communication. Ambience was calming and the restaurant is within an old bungalow with a lovely garden. Only thing is the pricing was on the pricier end.

This restaurant was part of a food experience/ cooking class organized by Intrepid Adventures. The staff and hostess were very knowledgeable and the cooking class was a lot of fun. We were also able to tour the ancestor house and beautiful grounds and artwork around the restaurant which was an old family estate in Hue. We then enjoyed a lovely lunch in the vegetarian restaurant. The hostess went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and was able to help me with a health concern as well! Thanks Nhien!

name: Đai Nam – Authentique Cuisine de Hue
address: 02 Doan Thi Diem, Hue 53000 Vietnam
description: The restaurant serves Hue food, Vietnamese and Asian food. The restaurant has Hue old house style of Nguyen dynasty.
cuisines: Italian Restaurants for Large Groups in Hue
example_reviews: We happened upon Dai Nam restaurant by accident. It was beautiful and very clean inside. We were a party of 6 just coming from the Citadel and were exhausted and hungry. Our waiter, Dat spoke English and helped us through the menu. We ordered spring rolls for the table and my husband ordered Shaky Beef and I had pork with mushroom and onion. All of the food was fresh and delicious and Dat was super helpful and personable. This was a great choice

Đai Nam restaurant is located in the garden of the lovely Spatel d'Annam, a really attractive boutique hotel across the street from the Hue Citadel. We came across it when we were walking back from the Citadel to our hotel across the river. We really just needed to use the toilet, and there was a WC sign near the front of the hotel, so we went in (with some trepidation). Although we were sweaty and dressed for sightseeing - and it was a very hot day - the hostess was extremely graciously and invited us in to the pretty garden area outside of the hotel, showed us to the facilities, and then showed us around the hotel and restaurant with evident pride. It's a really beautiful place. We came back to the restaurant that night, a little more presentable than earlier in the day. The setting is gorgeous, with seating indoors and outdoors. We ordered Bò Lúc Lắc and "Shaky Prawns" - both delicious. Service was impeccable. A thoroughly enjoyable evening. One of my favorite meals in 3 weeks in Vietnam.
Every dish was delicious! Duck with pineapple, beef la lot, banana blossom salad - all were amazingly tasty. Inside an historical building - highly recommend trying this restaurant.

name: Ngo Nho Restaurant & Cafe
address: 10/68 Dang Dung, Hue Vietnam
description: Come to Ngo Nho (Small Lane) to enjoy and feel. We promise to bring you joy and satisfaction with our dedicated and attentive services!
example_reviews: Delicious food. I chose the set menu and everything was great. The waitress even helped make my rice paper rolls in front of me. The iced chocolate was also very nice and helped cool me down from the searing temperatures outside.

Nice restaurant at the end of an alley right in front of our hotel, found thanks to our guide, offers Vietnamese cuisine. Aside from the menu, two set menus are offered, we opted for the less abundant one because the portions are always enormous. Soup with fish, sautéed vegetables, pork with caramelized onions and prawns in tamarind sauce, accompanied by the inevitable white rice. Home cooking at a very affordable price.

Wow! We walked down this tiny alley following a sign saying “food” expecting street food. What an amazing find. My lady saw a great looking fish on the counter and said I want that! I chose the set menu. It was more than enough for 2 and each dish was better than the last. There were 7 different items served and each was a dish I’d never had before. We came at 14:00, between lunch and dinner as they were preparing for a large party yet the owner personally brought us each dish I live in Vietnam and usually eat out, anywhere from street food to 5 star. This was the best dining experience I’ve had in all my time in Vietnam.

name: Thị's Kitchen
address: 31b Võ Thị Sáu Phường Phú Hội, Hue 49118 Vietnam
description: Thi’s kitchen is in a great location with even better food. You are able to sit next to the street and watch the laidback Hue lifestyle. The staff are very friendly and were ready to help, they even gave us free fruit as a dessert. We had a curry and noodle dish, and the curry in particular was very tasty. At £8 total, this was worth stopping by for
cuisines: French Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Thi’s kitchen is in a great location with even better food. You are able to sit next to the street and watch the laidback Hue lifestyle. The staff are very friendly and were ready to help, they even gave us free fruit as a dessert. We had a curry and noodle dish, and the curry in particular was very tasty. At £8 total, this was worth stopping by for

We visited Hue a few days ago and were recommended this restaurant by Hue Sweethouse Homestay. We were not disappointed, Thi’s is a fantastic restaurant. The quality of the food was absolutely superb, cooked on the spot for us and totally fresh. The ingredients used were first class and everything was perfectly seasoned. We can particularly recommend the bamboo skewers and had prawns, squid and duck. It was all totally delicious and there was also a choice of quality wine, as well as local draught beer. We would highly recommend this family run restaurant.

Had a lovely meal in relaxed atmosphere on balcony, watching the world go by. BBQ skewers were amazing. Sat there for hours, they were happy to serve drinks all night, no rush! Even when it rained, no problem roof was on in seconds.

name: Ama Restaurant
address: Khai Dinh's Neighbor, An Tay Ward, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Here's the first one I came here to have travel. It's amazing view with well designed and many lovely things. The staffs very lovely, they warmly welcome us and made delicious cocktails go together salty peanuts. We have a great time here, we will be back one more time and highly recommend this restaurant to our friends.
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Here's the first one I came here to have travel. It's amazing view with well designed and many lovely things. The staffs very lovely, they warmly welcome us and made delicious cocktails go together salty peanuts. We have a great time here, we will be back one more time and highly recommend this restaurant to our friends.
A very good and pleasant restaurant with delicate serving and plating. We had 3 course dinner and enjoyed it a lot. Situated in their beautiful garden
I have very enjoy my holiday at Anhill, really great amazing view and sighseeing! Good foods, nice coffee with very good service! Thank you and see you again! Madame Thư.

name: Stella Garden
address: 01 Nguyễn Sinh Cung, Phường Vỹ Dạ, Quận Thuận Hoá, Thành Phố Huế, Hue 50000 Vietnam
description: This is the only restaurant in Hue City situated on its own island along the Huong River, offering guests a unique and scenic dining experience.
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: This restaurant is such a gem! It’s located on a small island right by the river, which already makes it feel special. The building itself is beautiful, with a cozy and relaxed vibe that makes you want to stay longer. It’s the perfect spot to escape the hustle and just enjoy some quiet time with amazing food. The menu offers all kind of Vietnamese dishes ranging from multiple choices of protein to vegetable or rice and noodles, and everything we tried was super fresh and full of flavor. The spring rolls were crispy and delicious, and the Beef with pate sauce was one of the best I’ve had. The meat was fresh and tender, the sauce is rich in flavor. You can tell they really care about the quality of their food. What made it even better was the view. Sitting by the river, especially during sunset, was such a treat. The combination of great food, friendly service, and the view made it one of the most memorable meals I’ve had in Vietnam. If you’re in the area, definitely check this place out.

Nice and modern new place, opened a month ago, very nice on an islet of Hue. Large spaces with some acoustic problems. It offers a more refined cuisine with a very rich menu. We had beef with pâté, excellent, squid with tamarind sauce, very good, and an appetizer made with shrimp and pork salad that convinced a little less. Very kind and friendly service, excellent premises for a promising future. To try.

Food is amazing and staff are even nicer! They were so helpful and kind - especially Phuong Trinh!! We tried lots of dishes and were too full to finish them so they packed them up for us to go! Beautiful location as well right on the Perfume River

name: Gecko Pub - Restaurant
address: 9 Pham Ngu Lao, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Gecko Pub is located at 9 Pham Ngu Lao Street. This area is the central hangout for Westerners in Hue City. The street are always fun and cozy. The Gecko Pub itself is a great spot to check out while youâ€™re in Hue, with its special decor and warm, friendly atmosphere. You will feel at home here and enjoy good time at your own, or like in a good friendâ€™s home and courtyard. Here you can just relax while we take care of everything for you. When you come to Gecko Pub youâ€™ll be able to enjoy perfect Western dishes as well as have the opportunity to experience many fine examples of our local cuisine. While youâ€™re at it, donâ€™t forget the sweet cocktails and deep glasses of wine, waiting to be served in the comfortable surroundings. Welcome to Gecko Pub ! You will be served the best, at the most reasonable prices.
example_reviews: I have good time enjoying food and craft beer in this nice restaurant. Food is really nice , I recommend pizza, smoked meat, spaghetti , beef steak! Craft beer is nice selected for new experienced drinkers. I love this place and will come more often!

Great restaurant with a rooftop terrace - nice setup and decor. A wide range of Vietnamese cuisine, vegetarian options and western options, all very tasty! The staff all spoke English very well, and were all helpful. The food was so amazing that we ate here three nights in a row! Highly recommended!

I recommend this restaurant. Very nice atmosphere! We were at Gecko on August 7. I didn't taste the pizza but my friend loved it. Regarding Hue's specialties , it was very delicious! And we really liked the craft beer. The little waitress was very nice when I asked her to suggest an ancient pagoda to visit near my accommodation.

name: The Cham Craft Beer & Coffee
address: 56 Nguyen Tri Phuong Phu Hoi, Hue Vietnam
description: A cosy, relaxing and interactive space breathing nice architecture, local cuture-history and hi-end music. Quality coffee and Vietnamese Craft Beers.
example_reviews: My wife and I popped in on the way past as we are craft beer lovers. This place has a great selection of craft beer, cider and also whiskey from around the world. There is plenty of seating and staff are helpful and attentive. Prices are reasonable and there are choices of glass size from the drinks on tap. We would have had a drink here every night, my wife was also more than likely going to buy one of the cool canvas bags available. However when the bill came we were charged for the "refreshing hand wipes". These were given to us along with a dish of peanuts, we didn't ask for them or need them. They were only 5,000VND so not expensive, but, if something is being charged the customer needs to be informed. Due to this we won't be coming back as it feels like a small scam of getting extra money from a customer.

Came here on a Sunday morning lunch after a tiring morning visiting all the sites. They did not have cooked food before 4 pm but had the sausage cheese and olive platter. Binh offered to get food from another ( the Nook) restaurant so we did not have to go looking elsewhere in this heat. The wheat craft beer on tap was great ! My friend sprained her ankle , he even got us a spray from the pharmacy. This is going above and beyond ! Thank you so much !!

I had the opportunity to come here and look forward to coming back again. The atmosphere is great, their beer is varied and has many different flavors. Must try everyone Special thanks to Mr. Vu for giving me many travel experiences as well as delicious places to eat!

name: Ngon Burger
address: 48 Chu Van An, Phu Hoi Ward, Hue Vietnam
description: Fast food restaurant. Burger and bagguette. We make our own recipe the burger buns and sauce. Currently, we are the one have the biggest buns and bagguette in town so far.
cuisines: Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Amazing Burgers and Draft Beer in the Heart of Hue Ngon Burger is hands down the best burger spot in Hue when it comes to both quality and price. The ingredients are fresh, the flavors are spot on, and each burger feels carefully crafted—not something you find everywhere. Whether you’re into the classics or want to try something a bit more unique, there’s something on the menu for everyone. What really sets Ngon Burger apart, though, is the fact that they serve draft beer—something surprisingly rare in Hue. It’s the perfect pairing with their delicious burgers and adds to the laid-back, welcoming vibe of the place. If you’re in Hue and craving a great burger (and a cold beer to go with it), Ngon Burger should be your first stop. Highly recommended!

We really enjoyed some 'comfort food' at Ngon burger. Our kids age 11, 9 and 6 loved their burgers and hubby and I had a chicken baguette. It was huge and really tasty. The customer service was exceptional the place had a fun atmosphere and view of all the activity happening in the street. Thanks for having us.

Tasty burger with good quality meat. The cheese was similar to usual american burger quality and the sauce was delicous! Pickles were ok, not traditional dill and I think the brine is not quite right. However it was okay. Fries were very good. The owner was very sweet and offered complimentary watermelon afterwards. I highly recommend this place if you want to take a break from vietnamese food for lunch. Also not greasy! So you do not feel to heavy afterwards.

name: Vu Cuisine
address: 6 duong Nguyễn thaï hoc, Hue 99243 Vietnam
description: Long stay in Hue, we went four times in January and most recently on February 28, 2024. We tasted the famous pizzas and the crab pasta are excellent, we will come back with pleasure, the staff is professional, attentive (a little word in French) and kind. The relaxing musical atmosphere and best of all the boss is very nice, he even turned the oven back on to make us two pizzas, even though it was closing time. Above all, don't hesitate between one or the other. Choose Vù Cuisine to enjoy yourself, it's not the factory, it's a restaurant, a real Italian.
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Long stay in Hue, we went four times in January and most recently on February 28, 2024. We tasted the famous pizzas and the crab pasta are excellent, we will come back with pleasure, the staff is professional, attentive (a little word in French) and kind. The relaxing musical atmosphere and best of all the boss is very nice, he even turned the oven back on to make us two pizzas, even though it was closing time. Above all, don't hesitate between one or the other. Choose Vù Cuisine to enjoy yourself, it's not the factory, it's a restaurant, a real Italian.

Delicious dishes, excellent pizza, much better than many Italian pizzerias, the pizza was rightly juicy and not dry, not contaminated by local flavours, the gnocchi with delicious fish bisque, the fillet a little small but so soft that it could be "cut with a breadstick" the accompanying vegetables are crunchy but not tough and the puree is excellent. 4 beers. Vanilla ice cream made with whipped cream and vanilla all for $35. What can I say passed with flying colors

Amazing ! If you want to eat burrata, arugula or even truffle, it’s ideal. We feasted. The portions are quite large and the staff are lovely. What a pleasure to find a little bit of Italy in Vietnam! 😍 For the price it’s around €10 per pizza but it’s worth it for our palate!

name: Mr. Pho - Pho Cafe
address: 35 Bui Thi Xuan, Hue Vietnam
description: Mr Pho was so so friendly and spotted us as soon as we got dropped at the train station. He greeted us with the biggest smile and hello which made our days! He had a great rate for luggage storage and our things felt very safe. He was very helpful in giving directions and we would highly recommend!
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Mr Pho was so so friendly and spotted us as soon as we got dropped at the train station. He greeted us with the biggest smile and hello which made our days! He had a great rate for luggage storage and our things felt very safe. He was very helpful in giving directions and we would highly recommend!

My wife and I were traveling back to Hoi An by train and Mr Pho’s place stood out, it was clean, well organized, and right across from the train station. We bought sodas and bottled water (fair priced and cheaper than all the other places around). Mr. foe is a kind gentleman who came out and attended to us; very polite, articulate, and professional!. Very knowledgeable about Hue and all there is to see and do here. We’ll stop back in on our next visit to Hue, and have a bite to eat too! Still can’t get over how clean and organized Mr Pho’s is! Wish more places were like this). Safe adventures!!

Hopped off the train in Hue was feeling super overwhelmed with all the taxis and people. I say down at Mr Phos place, ordered some food. He was so helpful, and not pushy and face me some great advice. The food was yummy too :) He offered to help sort a scooter rental with luggage drop off for 500d, which I didn't take but in theory I should have as we ended up spending far more with a different company. Later in the day I was wandering around train station like a little lost puppy dog looking for a toilet, he saw me shouted asking if I needed help and let me come over and use his toilet. Anyways. You rock Mr. Pho.

name: Cafe on Thu Wheels
address: 3/34 Nguyen Tri Phuong Street, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: This place offers multiple vegetarian dishes including vegetables, rice and tofu or nuts for only 65k Dong.  They also have chicken, beef and so on but we were very happy about the vegetarian options. The staff speaks English and are very friendly. They even left out one of the ingredients upon request which I very appreciated.
cuisines: Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: This place offers multiple vegetarian dishes including vegetables, rice and tofu or nuts for only 65k Dong. They also have chicken, beef and so on but we were very happy about the vegetarian options. The staff speaks English and are very friendly. They even left out one of the ingredients upon request which I very appreciated.

The food truck offers a unique twist on classic dishes, with bold flavors and fresh ingredients. The service is friendly, but sometimes a bit slow during peak hours. Overall, a great spot for a quick bite!

We only had a very light breakfast at Cafe on Thu Wheels (a shake each and a croissant to share). The croissant was the best we’ve tasted in Vietnam! Our shakes were freshly made, very tasty and very reasonably priced. Lots of western or Vietnamese options on the menu. What made it for us was that the service was so lovely, the waitress was really friendly and wanted to sit down and chat with us, which we were very happy to do. Would highly recommend a visit and would return if we were staying longer, wish we’d found CTTW sooner!

name: Be Than Restaurant
address: Lang Co Town, Phu Loc District, Hue Vietnam
description: We enjoyed having diner here. In this very busy resraurant you still feel welcome, the service is very friendly. The food is standard but good. Funny is the springrolls of which you get the ingredients separately on the table and that you have to roll them yourself.
cuisines: European Restaurants for Large Groups in Hue
French Restaurants for Large Groups in Hue
Italian Restaurants with Buffet in Hue
example_reviews: We enjoyed having diner here. In this very busy resraurant you still feel welcome, the service is very friendly. The food is standard but good. Funny is the springrolls of which you get the ingredients separately on the table and that you have to roll them yourself.

Incredible food. The clay pot pork is amazing and so flavoursome. The oysters are the best we have ever had. Our easyriders took us here as part of our lunch package, they ate with us. Fab experience on the journey from Hoi An to Hue. The views from here are pretty awesome. We didn’t have any interaction from any of the staff, so can’t comment on them.
Plenty of options for fresh sea food as you come in which you can view in ponds and tanks. Far too busy and very noisy. Spoils the potential for the expected tranquil location!

name: Garden Riverside Bar
address: 1 Lane 7 Nguyen Cong Tru str, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Warmest greeting from Garden Riverside Bar! The French house under the Green garden overlooks two famous rivers in Hue, the Perfume River and Nhu Y River. Enjoy good cocktails, listen to great music and play fun games. Intimate Chilled Environment.
cuisines: French Restaurants with Private Dining in Hue
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Best service I’ve had at any bar or restaurant in the whole of Vietnam. Incredibly friendly staff, free shots every 30 minutes, free fruit plate on arrival, constant stream of salted nuts. The on-site art gallery is breathtaking. Lovely view of the river. The drinks are a bit more expensive than other places but it’s definitely worth it and the cocktails are strong but tasty. We played uno and pool with other games available free of charge. Would definitely recommend.

We spent a few nights in Hue and kept coming back here again and again. The setting is beautiful on the bank of the Perfume river, and being providing a refreshing shot and fresh fruit on arrival is a nice touch. However, the best thing here is the staff. They couldn’t have looked after us more. We played pool together and had lots of laughs each night. Many thanks to Tim in particular for being such a great host! I hope we meet again soon!

We really enjoyed stopping by for a few drinks during our vacation. The staff were wonderful and very easy to talk to! The drinks were delicious, and the bar offered several complementary items that were a very nice touch! (A welcome drink/shot, welcome fruit plate and waters for the road). Being right on the river was very relaxing! We did not play any games while there but the bar also had games to play as well. 10/10 would recommend! Variety of people. Good for friend/couples/individuals etc. there was also a family dining while we were there.

name: Secret Lounge Hue
address: 15/42 Nguyen Cong Tru, Hue 49000 Vietnam
description: Secret Lounge Hue is an open-air bar within a tropical garden setting, offering budget-conscious travellers a satisfying selection of Shisha, bar snacks, Great music, good Cocktails and fun games. Designed full of moder art by artist Mr.Lucky.
example_reviews: The place is super, as is the music, the cocktails and the friendliness of the staff! As soon as you arrive they offer you some fresh fruit to welcome you, a shot (to drink Vietnamese style, if you want to know what that means, go for it! 🤩) and a game to pass the time! Very nice idea, also for giving up your phones every now and then. The only flaw is the location (perhaps a little too secret) and the cocktails which are very, very good, also accompanied by various snacks, but also quite expensive for Vietnamese standards. In any case, don't miss it! ✨✨✨

We randomly found this nice cocktail place. Cocktails are a little more expensive than at other bars (from 150k) but when we sat down at our assigned table, they served a plate of fresh fruit and a welcome shot. Later we got free snacks (pringles), and when we paid everyone got a bottle of water. The staff was very friendly and the cocktails are good, however the White russian is very small.

Amazing staff, awesome atmosphere and really great place for drinks! The staff are all so nice, and very friendly, they cannot do enough for you! You also definitely get your value for money with the cocktails as they are absolutely not watered down! Located down a quiet side street it’s definitely worth a visit! During our visit we also got a free fruit platter, nuts and sweets, and fresh table water which was very nice! Along with table games to play such as jenga. Highly recommend! Don’t be put off if it’s quieter than the bars on the main roads, it’s a little hidden away but totally worth it for amazing service, great drinks and the friendliest staff we’ve met in Vietnam!

name: Nón Huế- Authentic Hue Food
address: 77 Nguyễn Sinh Cung Vỹ Dạ, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Each dish at Nón Huế is a masterpiece crafted from fresh ingredients, traditional recipes passed down through generations, and our heartfelt dedication. From the rich bún bò Huế to the delicate bánh bèo and bánh nậm, every bite tells the story of this poetic land. Join us on a culinary journey where every flavor brings you closer to the pure and unique beauty of Huế. “Nón Huế eat for memories, eat for love Hue “
example_reviews: The bánh nậm here is simply outstanding - wrapped in dong leaves with the perfect ratio of rice flour to shrimp filling. While some dishes were slightly pricier than street food, the quality justifies the cost. The restaurant's elegant atmosphere and attention to detail create an authentic dining experience worth every penny.

It was one of the awesome peak experiences of my solo travelling. The diversity of the food, as well as the price was really just affordable and reasonable. The staff named So, also was attentive all the time, showed me how to prepare and eat the food properly with great patience. Very polite, well mannered, and cute as well.

Miss 8 offers not only delicious Vietnamese dishes but also a charming atmosphere that enhances the dining experience. The restaurant's decor is tastefully done, creating a cozy and welcoming ambience. The menu features a diverse selection of dishes, and the staff is more than willing to guide you through the culinary journey. Whether you're a local or a visitor, Miss 8 provides a delightful escape into the world of Vietnamese flavors...

name: Barlab-Rooftop
address: 62 Chu Văn An, phường Phú Hội 3rd Floor, Hue 52000 Vietnam
description: This spot is absolutely wonderful for some drinks at night. It is an intimate, cozy and sophisticated spot. The atmosphere was great - the view is wonderful, overlooking the city and lit by some gorgeous light fittings. Our seats were comfy and the place had a nice breeze thanks to the outdoors and the fan. They had a great selection of cocktails and craft beers, which we very much enjoyed. My margarita was excellent! They bring out complementary snacks which they refill throughout which were so more-ish. We tried some the buffalo jerky too which was very tasty and goes down great with a beer. The server Tuan was lovely too and we appreciated his recommendations. I am definitely coming back before I leave Hue!
cuisines: Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: This spot is absolutely wonderful for some drinks at night. It is an intimate, cozy and sophisticated spot. The atmosphere was great - the view is wonderful, overlooking the city and lit by some gorgeous light fittings. Our seats were comfy and the place had a nice breeze thanks to the outdoors and the fan. They had a great selection of cocktails and craft beers, which we very much enjoyed. My margarita was excellent! They bring out complementary snacks which they refill throughout which were so more-ish. We tried some the buffalo jerky too which was very tasty and goes down great with a beer. The server Tuan was lovely too and we appreciated his recommendations. I am definitely coming back before I leave Hue!

This is a cosy rooftop bar, very relaxing even within the hustle and bustle of walking street. Drinks are lovely and staff are more than happy to help with drink selection. In particular, our server Toan was very lovely, chatty and made us feel very welcome! Would highly recommend this bar. Views are an added bonus!

Really beautiful bar decorated with stunning chandeliers from Venice and France. Lovely Tiffany lamps. Quite stunning. Also…, really great cocktails. The barman certainly knows his stuff. A lovely classy bar. Highly recommend with a great ambience and comfy chairs. Fabulous music too. Soft jazz vibe.

name: Sunrise Lounge
address: 33 Hai Bà Trưng St Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: At the 15th floor of Thanh Lich Royal Boutique Hotel, Sky Bar Sunrise Lounge proudly offers a romantic ambiance and panoramic views of the city, promising to awe you with unforgettable sights. With its open and comfortable space, Sunrise Lounge is the perfect rendezvous for outdoor parties and weekend getaways. Sunrise Lounge pledges to be the most impressive destination for all your memorable moments!
cuisines: Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Khoa was very kind and friendly, the breakfast was various and delicious, fresh fruit on demand included ! The breakfast room with a view on the town lovely!
Very nice welcome by KHOA HOA. He was very friendly and advised us on visits to the city. We had a great time
Staff and Khoa very accommodating and friendly. Additional fruit was brought. Very thoughtful. Thanks for everything.

name: Quán nhạu 36
address: 36 Đinh Tiên Hoàng, Hue Vietnam
description: Quán nhậu bình dân tại Huế A popular restaurant in Hue City
example_reviews: Great food, even better service! The waiter brought us out complimentary berries which we’d never tried before - they were delicious. The iced salt coffee is a MUST try, although we couldn’t see it on the menu, ask for it!

Place just outside the Imperial City, brings Cửa Thượng Tứ , tables for 2 people under the plants, some on the canal that runs along the city. A nice breeze accompanied us during a break on the midday where the thermometer marked 35 degrees. Tried fried spaghetti with tofu, and fried rice. All great and very kind staff. Very recommended.

We were passing by from the imperial city and came across this little place for lunch. We had a very warm welcome and the food was great and very good value for money. Great spot to sit and have lunch and a beer by the water as well.

name: Bún Bò Huế Sen
address: 69 B Võ Thị Sáu Phú Hội, Hue 49000 Vietnam
description: Open: Monday - Sunday: 7am - 10pm Open: Christmas Eve & Day, New Year's Eve & Day Happy Hours 5PM to 10PM daily: Bruschetta Fruit plates Free 1 glass Dalat wine for 1 pizza
example_reviews: Very good place to eat Italian or Vietnamese. We were very well received by the hosts of the place, whose service was perfect. After enjoying the complimentary bruschetta, we enjoyed some very good pizza, with thin, crunchy dough and generously garnished. Complimentary passion fruit rounded off a meal without a single false note! I absolutely recommend going through the door of this restaurant with its unbeatable value for money and very welcoming owners!

This restaurant was recommended to us by a friend. It was known for great food and superb friendly staff/owner The restaurant has both Italian and local cuisines for groups with different tastes and choices The foods were great at reasonable prices. It has Happy Hour offers (free beer, free starter and dessert) and the restaurant owner/manager was very accommodating- she was happily accommodating my request (change a desert to non sugary drink). She is always smiling and checking if things are okay We left the restaurant feeling satisfied and happy

We were just looking for a snack and thought we'd give this restaurant a go. We had 3 pizzas which were all cooked perfectly and a salad. The price of these was really reasonable and on top of this we were given some free bruschetta as well as a free beer. The staff were all really attentive and friendly as well. Definitely worth a visit.

name: Why Not? Bar & Restaurant Hue
address: 19 Pháº¡m NgÅ© LÃ£o, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: We found this restaurant whilst exploring the area and went back for lunch. We were not disappointed. The meals were a great price, even the western food was reasonable and the kids loved it. We had a mix of western and Vietnamese food, Beer cocktails mocktails and juice and it was all amazing. We ended up back again for dinner because the kids enjoyed it so much and the price was so reasonable
example_reviews: We found this restaurant whilst exploring the area and went back for lunch. We were not disappointed. The meals were a great price, even the western food was reasonable and the kids loved it. We had a mix of western and Vietnamese food, Beer cocktails mocktails and juice and it was all amazing. We ended up back again for dinner because the kids enjoyed it so much and the price was so reasonable

Initially we picked this restaurant as it has a snooker table and our son has become really into pool on this holiday. However we were very pleasantly surprised to discover that â€˜Why Notâ€™ also has a great variety menu, very good food and such friendly and professional service. We didnâ€™t feel in any rush to eat- and- run as the ambience is perfect, music isnâ€™t blaring and the facilities are clean which is not a common combination in SE Asian restaurants. We have eaten lunch and dinner out every day for the past 8 weeks travelling through Asia, and this place stands out as a firm favourite. We are now in Hoi An so want to try the restaurant here too.

We went here for a late lunch on New Year's Eve. Very welcoming staff, and clearly popular with some regular expats/tourists for its pool tables. An unusual mix of Vietnamese and Mexican food, and we stuck with the Vietnamese food. My choice (beef) was not great, but seemingly just a bad choice; all other members of the group had excellent food.

name: Kyodai Japanese Restaurant
address: 66 1, Le Loi Opposite Century Hotel, Hue 530000 Vietnam
description: Delicious sushi in Hue city.
example_reviews: What a wonderful surprise to find a great spot for fresh tasty Japanese sashimi and sushi in Hue. We live in Vancouver, Canada and know our Japanese food pretty well from travel to Japan and our local Japanese restaurants. Kyodai in Hue had exceeded all of our expectations for fresh sashimi in Vietnam. We know Vietnam is great for seafood but hadnâ€™t ventured to a Japanese place over the past three weeks of Vietnam travel here. This was picked on random and could have been a big mistake. It wasnâ€™t!!
